addr: 110 William Street, 2nd Floor New York, NY 10038
title: Signing a Commercial Lease: What You Need to Know!, Lower Manhattan, 12/8/15
desc: Learn how to negotiate a fair commercial lease! Business owners know that securing the right commercial space is an important decision, but many are not prepared to enter the lease negotiation process. By effectively negotiating a lease agreement before signing it, small business owners can avoid costly mistakes in the future. This course offers useful steps you can take to prepare for negotiating a commercial lease that serves your interests and minimizes risks. The course instructors are attorneys who have counseled both landlords and tenants on lease agreements and can share practical strategies for success. ? You will learn about:
